name: Northern California Crystal Meth Anonymous
description: Northern California Crystal Meth Anonymous is a non-profit 12-step fellowship for those in San Francisco and in other areas in Northern California who are in recovery from addiction to crystal meth. The fellowship advocates complete abstinence from: - crystal meth - alcohol - inhalants - medications not taken as prescribed - all other mind-altering substances If you experiencing a medical or psychiatric emergency, immediately call 911.
